summary: This mod corrects the many typos and grammar issues in the mod Secret of Dragonhead.
descriptionHtml:
A mod to correct the typos and poor grammar in the Secret of Dragonhead mod by MannyGT. (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16197/?)

Instructions:
Install the Secret of Dragonhead, latest version.
Place Dragonhead fix.esp in your Skyrim Data folder and use NMM or other mod manager to place it BELOW mannyDragonhead in the load order, then activate it with NMM.

Permission for this mod was granted by mannyGT.
author: DarthVitrial
